Articles.Content:
Unfortunately i can't tell exactly if this is due to using mods, but i do care to keep them all at the latest release.

I love the new Warp to feature (clicking in map view on a line) for warping to next maneuver node or just before it. Sometimes (1 out of 10?) warp time left counts to zero but timewarp does not stop as it should.

This is the only bug i have found in 1.0.2 so far, and its annoying. F5/F9 solves this problem, but would be nice if this gets fixed.

KSP 1.0.2 @Windows 7, 2 GB Ram

Mods in use: 

xScience

ContractConfigurator

AnomalySurveyor

KerbalEngineer

kOS

SpaceY-Lifters

WaypointManager

WiderContractsApp

Module Manager
